message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
